dct_title_s: Light Rail Routes and Stops Portland Metro, Oregon 2001
dct_description_sm: These line and point data layers represent the light rail routes and stops that exist and are under construction for Portland Metro, Oregon in 2001. They are feature classes within the geodatabase, PortlandMetro_LightRailRoutesAndStops_2001.gdb. The dataset was originally published by the Metro Data Resource Center in February 2001.
